data.persona: I am often employed to be a soldier in someone's army. I am a very good show with my bow and arrow. I like the heat of battle.
data.description:
You are in the The armory.
The near top of the tower 6 feet before the very top. Where the watchers keep their eye out for trouble. It's made of stone and has doors to several places including the outside. there are weapons from all over the world held within the armory.
There's a sword, a door, a weapon, and a pike here.
The peasant and the watcher are here.

You are carrying an arrow, wearing a shirt and a shield, and wielding a bows.

data.short_motivation: I need to drink the tincture to gain magically enhanced eyesight.
data.mid_motivation: I want to show off my archery skills to the peasant and the watcher by beating them in a contest of shooting a target from far away.
data.long_motivation: I want everyone in the land to recognize me as one of the best archers in the kingdom and to frequently employ me for battles.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go top of tower, where a peasant and a watcher are sitting

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit distant rabbit with an arrow

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give bow and arrow to peasant and watcher so that they can try shooting

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get bow and arrow from chagrined peasant and watcher
